head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WALL, HALLY PETER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WALL, HALLY PETER

block.p: WALL-Hally Peter. Died July 9, 2000 at Princeton Hospital after a long illness of Parkinson's Disease. Beloved husband of Patricia Allen Wall. Adored father of Alexander Wall, Anne Wall Cherom, and Amy Wall Nelson. Proud grandfather to Eliza Aho, Peter, Henry, and Jack Nelson. Funeral will be at Trinity Episcopal Church, Princeton, NJ, July 17 at 1:00 PM.
